price: 42. Ve con tu hermano con Mis pruebas (y milagros) y no se cansen de mencionarme y glorificarme.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
